txt.en: 'Had enough of Zelem-melek, have you? Well, you will always be welcome in the Twenty-first Hall, [placeholder], for the services you did us.\n\n'There is a goat waiting in the stable that already knows the way there, if you do not wish to take your chances on the road. It is a difficult journey to the Orc-watch....'
'Ah, greetings to you, [placeholder]. Welcome to the Orc-watch. We are certainly in need of aid, if that is why you are here.'
You have helped Mögr in Zelem-melek, and he has received word that the Orc-watch in the Redhorn Lodes is in need of aid as well.
Talk to Avar at the Orc-watch (a goat is available for travel, for the journey is difficult)

Avar is in the Orc-watch in the Redhorn Lodes, a long ways from the Twenty-first Hall through the many winding passages of Zelem-melek.\n\nMögr has invited you to ride a goat to the Redhorn Lodes if the journey is too difficult on foot.
